S04n443:7: tena khalu punaḥ samayena sarve te nāga-rājāḥ saparivārā uttāyāsanebhya ekāṃsam-uttarā-saṅgāni kṛtvā dakṣiṇāni jānu maṇḍalāni pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṃs tenāñjaliṃ praṇamyāprameyāsamkhyeyaiḥ parama-vividha-ruciraiḥ puṣpa-dhūpa-gandha-mālya-vilepana-cūrṇa-civara-cchatra-dhvaja-patāka-paṭṭa-dāma-vādya-tūrya-tāḍāvacāra-saṃgīti-ratnakusuma- ratnadāma-muktāhāra-nāgapuṣpa-muktajālaig garjanto guḍuguḍāyamāna mahā-vātāṃ pravāyanto mahā-nādaṃ nadanto ramaṇīyāṃś ca dharma-nādaṃ nadantaḥ,
S04n443:8: mahatā-guru-gaurava-citrī-kāreṇa bhagavantam abhicchādayantaḥ pradakṣiṇī kurvanti sma |
S04n443:19: samanta-dik-śroto 'bhimukād ekaikasmāt paramāṇurājo-bhagāt samanta-dik-kula-sphalaṇair asaṃbhinnaiḥ sarva-pūjā-megha-samudraiḥ,
S04n443:114: asaṃbhinnaiḥ sarva-buddha-bodhisattva-samudrān satkuryāmo gurukuryāmo mānayemaḥ pūjayemaḥ |
S04n443:135: sarvāsana-vyūha-saṃdarśana-raśmi-samudra-meghaiḥ asaṃbhinnaiḥ sarva-buddha-bodhisattva-samudrān satkuryāmo gurukuryāmo mānayemaḥ pūjayemaḥ |
S04n443:160: evam rūpaṃ praṇidhānaṃ kṛtvā te nāga-rājānaḥ punar api bhagavantaṃ triḥ pradakṣiṇikṛtya pādābhivadanāñ ca kṛtvā,
S04n443:162: tena khalu punaḥ samayena ananta-parikala-sāgala-megha-vyūha-tejo-maṇḍala-chatrākāra-rājas tri-sāhasra-mahā-sāhasriko mahā-nāgādhipatiḥ avaivartika-praṇidhāna-parikarmair jambudvīpe 'tyāgatas tathāgatasya pūjanāyai vandanāyai paryupāsanāyai dharma-śravaṇāyai ca |
S04n443:163: atha khalv ananta-parikara-sāgara-megha-vyūha-tejo-maṇḍala-chatrākāra-rājas tri-sāhasra-mahā-sāhasriko mahā-nāgādhipatiḥ utthāyāsanād ekāṃśam uttarā-saṅgaṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇam jānu-maṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṃs tenāñjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantam etad avocat |
S04n443:164: pṛccheyam ahaṃ bhagavantaṃ tathāgatam arhantaṃ samyaksambuddhaṃ kiñcid eva pradeśa-praśnaṃ sacen me bhagavān avakāśaṃ kuryāt pṛṣṭaḥ praśna-vyākaraṇāya |
S04n443:165: evam ukte bhagavān ananta-parikara-sāgara-megha-vyūha-tejo-maṇḍala-chatrākāra-rājaṃ nāgādhipatim etad avocat |
S04n443:166: pṛccha tvaṃ bhujaṅgādhipate yad yad evākāṅkṣasy ahaṃ te,
S04n443:168: evam ukte 'nanta-parikara-sāgara-megha-vyūha-tejo-maṇḍala-chatrākāra-rājas tri-sāhasra-mahā-sāhasriko mahā-nāgādhipatir bhagavantam etad avocat |
S04n443:170: praharṣitāḥ sukha-samanvitāś ceha jambu-dvīpe kālānukālaṃ varṣa-dhārā utsṛjeyuḥ,
S04n443:175: evam ukte bhagavān ananta-parikara-sāgara-megha-vyūha-tejomaṇḍala-chatrākāra-rājaṃ tri-sāhasra-mahā-sāhasriko mahā-nāgādhipatim etad avocat |
S04n443:176: sādhu sādhu bhujaṅgādhipate yat tvaṃ sarvasattvānāṃ hita-sukhāya pratipannaḥ tathāgatam etad arthaṃ paripraṣṭavyaṃ manyase |
S04n443:177: tena hi bhujaṅgādhipate śṛṇu sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasikuru bhāṣiṣye 'han te |
S04n443:178: eka-dharmena bhujaṅgādhipate samanvāgatānāṃ sarva-nāgānāṃ sarva-duḥkhāni praśraṃbhyeyuḥ,
S04n443:181: yaduta maitryā tatra bhujaṅgādhipate maitrī-vihāriṇo deva-manusyāḥ,
S04n443:195: sarva-sukha-samarpitāḥ uttare ca manuṣya-dharma-pratividhya-kāyasya bhedād brahma-loke upapadyante |
S04n443:197: tasmāt tarhi bhujaṅgādhipate maitreṇa kāya-karmaṇā maitreṇa vāk-karmaṇā maitreṇa manas-karmaṇā vihartavyaṃ |
S04n443:199: sā sarva-nāgānāṃ sarva-nāga-duḥkhāni pratiprasrambhyati sarva-sukhāni ca dadāti,
S04n443:200: yeneha jambudvīpe kālena kālaṃ varṣa-dhārā utsṛjati,
S04n443:203: tadyathā, dhāraṇi dhāraṇi uttāraṇi saṃpratiṣṭhitā vijaya-varṇa satyapratijñā sahā-jñānavati utpādani vināśani abhiṣecani abhivyāhāraśubhāvati ajīmatāmahi kumbāla-nivāhā,
S04n443:214: imāni tāni bhujaṅgādhipate dhāraṇī-mantra-padāni dhārayitavyāni parivarttayitavyāni sarva-sādhanāni dharma-praveśanāni sarvabuddhādhiṣṭhitāni sarva-sukha-pradānāni |
